title: Ask an Australian about her household [Italian version]
creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Italian.
